Nightlight::

"We can help you, if you let us" answered Nightlight who remembered 
what confuse she was when she left her pod. She had been in stasis a 
long time and if Rodimus and Blackfang wouldn't have found her 
perhaps she might die.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Gimliyotoden@a... wrote:
> "I don't have one....I live with the neandrthals... I remember 
coming from 
> the pod...and I have an inteligence of extrordinary level, compard 
to the 
> neandrthals...but I don't know where it came from"
